title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 July 2013 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius> has quit

10:43 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <Slashman> has quit  
10:53 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:40 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:44 <Slashman> has quit  
13:21 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
13:22 <polx> Hello XWiki experts, I just created a fresh MySQL DB, deployed a fresh tomcat, and a fresh xwiki (5.1) and could not start it: solr initialization fails.  
13:26 <camil7> does the directory for the solr index exist?  I guess per default that is the "environment.permanentDirectory" property +"solr"  from the xwiki.properties  
13:27 <polx> I've created it indeed.  
13:28 <polx> And I have just even tried to extract the solr directory inside the xwiki-platform-search-solr-api-5.1.jar into it (so that work/solr/conf/solrconfig.xml exists). But the result is the same.  
13:42 <camil7> the extraction should be "automatically" .... it must be something different  
13:42 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
15:15 <camil7> btw is there any "root cause" to the "solr initialization fails" error below ?  
15:37 <polx> @camil7, thank you, I had system property that was defining a wrong solr path.  
15:37 <camil7> ah, phew  
15:38 <polx> Write mails to mailing list and abort them seeing your error. This is such a good pedagogic practice!  
16:15 <polx> Hey team, does anyone know if the extension repository is indeed dad?  
16:15 <polx> (dead)  
16:33 <camil7> it is currently down due to server maintenance  
16:33 <camil7> should be back in a minute ... or two ...  
16:33 <polx> thx  
16:33 <camil7> actually it is back now for me  
16:37 <polx> and it just installed. Impressive.  
16:37 <sdumitriu> has quit  
16:37 <camil7> if it works, it is good magic :)  
16:38 <polx> I had ot relad  
16:38 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki
